snippet: The widow of the man who made the tapes said her husband had recorded many programs to test the refurbished machines.
abstract: Family of late electronics technician Martin Haupt has only known recording of Super Bowl I, played on Jan 15, 1967; is looking to sell tapes to NFL.
lead_paragraph: The widow of the man who made the tapes said her husband had recorded many programs to test the refurbished machines.

headline.main: Super Bowl I Recording Linked to Job Repairing Tape Machines
headline.print_headline: Super Bowl I Recording Linked to Job Repairing Tape Machines
